name: PixBit (itch)
description:
This is PixBit!

Just a simple ball hitting blocks mini-games with a 8-bit theme.

There will be 4 difficulties of this game, which only affects the game speed.

You guys can just play by moving your mouse cursor and the paddle will follows. You can pause the game by hitting esc button. 

And PS: You guys can autoplay the game by typing 'calvinlinardy' in the main menu :) and a check will show up on the left lower corner.
